Key Match Events: Several chances fell to Maximilian Beier and Chris Fuhrich in the second half.
Manuel Neuer lost the ball near the centre circle in the 89th minute, but it went unpunished due to an offside flag.
Pre-Game Insights: Several players were unavailable due to being called up for the Euros, including Toni Kroos, Niclas Fullkrug, Nico Schlotterbeck, and Antonio Rudiger.
Post-Match Reflections: Maximilian Beier's debut is a reason to get excited for the upcoming Euro 2024.
Kai Havertz was outshone by Beier and may not start for the tournament.
Positive momentum will be vital for Germany as they host Euro 2024 and face Scotland in Munich.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Julian Nagelsmann doesn't have his full squad available for the game.
Fullkrug, with 11 goals in 15 Germany appearances, is still to join the squad.
